titleStmt.title: A visitation speech delivered at Colchester in Essex, 1662
titleStmt.author: Hansley, John, d. 1666.
Church of England. Archdeaconry of Colchester.

notesStmt.note: Written by John Hansley. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Sixteenth title in a filmed collection of visitation articles.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
